website_summaries.verdict: The 4 digits on this lock makes it harder for a thief to open.
pros: Has a steel shackle instead of a cord
White on black numbers are easy to read
Heavy construction for a little lock
cons: The shackle length is shorter on this lock than on a wire lock, and may not fit all of your baggage or cases

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO READ & love the 4-digit combination
customer_reviews.text: I like this MUCH better than other luggage combination locks that I've used. 1) a 4-digit combination is 10x more secure than a 3-digit combination (although let's face it -- an aggressive thief can easily cut the lock if s/he wants) 2) I can actually READ these high-contrast white-on-black numbers, even without my reading glasses on!!!! That alone is a huge advantage. (the ones with "silver" combination dials are VERY hard to read)
customer_reviews.author: D. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Love the lock and the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock and the color, easy to spot at the gym. Just a recommendation: when you store it away, store it locked. Otherwise you run the risk of the combination changing, has not happened to me yet with this item (I always store it locked) but I know it can happen to locks like these and then is a pain to unlock them. But again, that happened with another product, not this one. This one is great.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Lesson learned
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the bad reviews before I purchased these locks. We followed the directions and now the first lock is stuck open and we can't lock it. I'm afraid to even try the second one now. Don't just read the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great Locks
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. I was traveling overseas and I wasn’t really worried about TSA so much as I was worried about the workers in the airport that I was landing at who are notorious for stealing things out of passengers bags. These work great and I had no issues whatsoever even with TSA checking my bags.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGirl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you set your own 4 digit combination
customer_reviews.text: The locks are OK; however, when I took the first one to set my own combination I did not, by mistake, turn the shackle all the way and, as a result, I lost the 0000 original combination and cannot find how to use it. I was more careful with the other ones. Still, I was only able to use 3 instead of 4 locks. Is there another way to open them in case of emergency ??
customer_reviews.author: P. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging came with no instructions on how to set the lock. I had to watch a YouTube video to get one lock to work. Never got the second lock to work. 😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Shopper29

customer_reviews.title: The 4-digit codes are easy to read (in the "window" on the narrow edge) ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. The 4-digit codes are easy to read (in the "window" on the narrow edge) and the metal shackle seems more secure than the wire loops on TSA locks I previously used. Survived trips through at least baggage handlers in USA, Italy and Germany without a scratch. I expect to buy a second pair for my wife's next trip. (Keeping these for myself.)
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Ann

customer_reviews.title: wha k
customer_reviews.text: whack! first off, i noticed that everyone else’s came in a nice little box with instructions. mine came with just two locks in a plastic bag. both locks are already unlocked and the preset combo did nothing. idk if these are used or what but this is hellllla disappointing
customer_reviews.author: kelcey s

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to turn the shackle the 2 turns required to set the code, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: lilymadonna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small Pelican tactical cases
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these parts for a Pelican tactical drone case, I really like them alot, much better than the larger heavy steel version I use on my Pelican 1650 case. The action on the wheels is very smooth and I am able to open it without looking at the combination thanks to the smooth but significant stops. I always use an algorythm to lock and unlock then ie, 1 click left, 1 right, 1 left, 1 right and the lock opens in reverse. I pick a code that leave a taunting code displayed when locked like 1234. You can set any combination easilywith these locks. I wish they came in all sizes I would buy a bunch
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: TSA cut the lock!
customer_reviews.text: The locks were very easy to use and I was able to set my own combination with no problems. However, TSA cut the lock off my checked bag during a recent trip.
customer_reviews.author: Diedra

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our luggage on our trip to Punta cana will when we got to our destination the lock was broke and my husband had to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: jennette

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and small and setting my own code was very ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because I haven't actually used is yet. But it came quickly, it's nice and small and setting my own code was very easy. Everything I wanted. Should work just great!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Goode

customer_reviews.title: The locks appear very sturdy and are a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these TSA Luggage Locks (2 Pack) in Yellow, for my upcoming trip. The locks appear very sturdy and are a little heavy. The lock combination is easy to set. Numbers of the combination are big and bold enough for easy read. I love the bright Yellow color and hope they will help to easily spot my black suitcases on the baggage claim conveyor belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OPEN WITH SCREWDRIVER
customer_reviews.text: The lock looks pretty and the numeric dials are easier to read than the traditional chrome color. But you can simply use a screwdriver and the lock just pops open. A waste of our time to get it. And there is no instruction to show how to change the combination. The package is terrible as one lock fell off from the box during shipment. A simple masking tape will secure all 6 locks inside that little package. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, distinctive yellow 4 digit combo locks - mechanism is very smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these yellow TSA locks for travel. I love the 4 digit combo because it's much harder to break than the 3-digit. I love these locks because they have a nice solid feel. I've been using them for my gym locker as well, which is great because they're secure enough for the purpose without being heavy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to use with high contrast numbers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set the combination. Bright yellow stands out. The numbers are very easy to read on the sides of the locks. Having four numbers instead of three makes it more difficult. These locks probably wouldn't stop a thief who had time or tools to break the shaft, but they likely would deter a casual opportunistic thief.
customer_reviews.author: World traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great Edge Design
customer_reviews.text: Great locks. Great design makes it easy to see which numbers you are dialing. Other locks I have used can be difficult to see the number you are dialing either because of low light or glare from bright light. The design of these locks with the the selected numbers on the edge eliminates the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have them!
customer_reviews.text: I had never had a luggage lock. I definitely feel like I could break them open with a hammer and a couple minutes. But this little deterrent could be the thing to tell thieves to try the next guy’s bag. Also used on cases and gym lockers. Like I said, they could be broken, I assume. I haven’t tried to break them.. but they are enough of a deterrent to make me glad I bought them, Plus they’re TSA approved.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Directions to set Combination are awful
customer_reviews.text: The paper instructions that come with it are terrible. It refers to illustrations A,B,C,D,E and F and yet none of the illustrations have letters. I struggled to get my combination programmed until I saw that there is a video in the listing for this lock. WATCH THE VIDEO.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Winter

customer_reviews.title: TSA didn't steal these
customer_reviews.text: I figured that since these look so awesome, they might come up missing. :) The reason I purchased this (besides the color) is that it uses a 4 digit numerical code. It was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Hoit

customer_reviews.title: White on Black is Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: What I really like about these locks is that the numbers are white on a black background and much easier to read than the black on silver background on most locks. Yeah, my eyes are getting old and this is a factor for me now. They were easy to setup and seem quite sturdy for what they need to do. I will not have a chance to travel with them for a few weeks, but so far I am quite pleased. Will write an update when they actually go through the acid test of an airline bag check and handling process.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ih

customer_reviews.title: 4 number code, easy to program and with a "shaft protector" so it can't be pried open easily.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lock similar in size (only 3 digits) on my gym locker until one day, someone pulled it hard enough to allow just enough space to open the lock and steal my wallet. This lock as a small shaft-protector that makes prying much harder! In addition, a 4-digit code (programmable) is far more difficult to guess... and the colors are pretty cool too! TSA approval makes this a simple solution for suitcase use, I gave my daughter two of them, and left the spare in my laptop bag in case I need it "at the last minute."
customer_reviews.author: E. Sherer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage locks
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage locks! I like the 4 digit combo lock and I think it’s better than the 3 digit. However, remember to scramble your combo after locking. I didn’t do that and after my flight, I reconnected with my luggage and my lock was totally gone. Its a bit heavy (non issue for luggage weight), but feels durable. Having a bright, non black lock is perfect for quickly location your luggage also.
customer_reviews.author: Chynna

customer_reviews.title: Great, but got me pulled aside at airport
customer_reviews.text: Great little locks. Along with the steel security tethers I bought, were the only thing that got me stopped at airport security. They weren't on the zippers of my travel backpack, just sitting in a pocket in the box. They pulled me aside and went right for them. Oh, it's just the TSA locks, haha! We all laughed. Minor inconvenience, but they are kind of made for that purpose, eh?
customer_reviews.author: OldCornerGlassworks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my EVSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually purchased this lock for my EVSE, the 3mm shackle and the length of the shackle fits the lock hole perfectly. 4-digit lock provides 10,000 combinations and it is easy to read and set your own codes. Went with the black one instead of the yellow for a stealthy look. I would recommend it if you are looking for one to lock your EVSE while charging in public garages, make sure to measure the lock hole before ordering as some of them are measuring 5mm instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be going in for surgery soon and need a combo lock to lock up my little suitcase that I’ll be taking. These are a Godsend! I’ve had a couple friends have their things stolen while they were hospitalized, one having her iPhone stolen. This will put off any unsavory staff who may try to snoop in my things and steal something. These are so easy to use, which I love!
customer_reviews.author: High 5

customer_reviews.title: TSA approved luggage lock with 4 digit combination
customer_reviews.text: TSA luggage lock with 4 digit combination was great for my travel luggage. I got purple so it’s easy to see. The combination on the side is a great idea visually. No problems setting the combination. It came with directions, but I also received an email from the seller with directions to set combination. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set and use.
customer_reviews.text: These locks are easy to set, slide onto suitcase and lock. Bright color makes it less likely to be left behind in hotel. They feel solid. I used them on a recent complicated trip to Ecuador, many venues and packing and unpacking. Kept luggage secure when I had to leave a bag behind to pick up later as it was stored in a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: These locks seem unnecessarily heavy compared to my other small TSA approved travel locks. Sure the body is sturdier, but really the U-lock part is the weak link to cut anyways, so I don’t think the sturdier body buys me any extra protection. But it is well made and the locking mechanism and combo wheels are of high quality, so I’m giving this 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: pdxdan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Construction $ Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The lock is easy to use & the 4-digit code adds extra security to my luggage to not be easily opened by unauthorized personnel other than TSA personnel. The yellow color lock is easily seen to identify my luggage In baggage claim. Note: I gave the lock 5 stars in all categories , however, when settings your personal code read the instructions carefully & folllow them exactly.
customer_reviews.author: CountryHeartGirl

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea how to use this lock
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure I did something wrong. I don't know what though. I have not been able to use this lock since I purchased it. The only thing I remember is that the initial lock combination is 0000. Don't know went wrong after that. Right now I can't use this tool so it's useless to me. I believe TSA went into my luggage so this lock would have been great to use because things got damaged inside my luggage. What do you recommend I do in this case? Looking forward to hearing from you with any suggestions. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Cox

customer_reviews.title: Asia approved
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues with Chinese or Krean security. They feel kind of cheap but they hold up great. One of out suitcases was actually broken on the way home casing smashed but that lock was still on and in tact. Love the bright color
customer_reviews.author: freezedriedbunE

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to lock my gear bag at the firehouse. Once I understood that the code is read from the spine of the lock and not the front face shown in pictures, everything made sense. Now I don't have to worry about the jr's messing with my stuff. I'm sure they'll work for luggage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy c

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for an overseas trip and it worked flawlessly. It also appears to be very well made and sturdy - a necessity when using any kind of lock. And, no issues with TSA or any other airport security in Europe. Make sure you don't throw away the instructions though - they are important.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Works so well that I can’t even open them!
customer_reviews.text: These are so hard to set. The directions are written very poorly and they don’t seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Good lock to have
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've had to purchase TSA locks. TSA took the locks and kept them from a previous trip (no fault of the lock) and didn't leave a notice that they opened my bag. These are very sturdy, easy to set the combination, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different kinds of locks, and these are by far the best. They are sturdy, easy to read, and easy to spot on the luggage carousel. Having four digits makes it harder for someone else to get into. I got the yellow ones and they really stand out. My husband likes how easy they are to read.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Zelda

customer_reviews.title: Work as Expected
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly. Just as most locks, there’s instructions on how to set your own lock - they were very simple and easy to understand. I’ve used the locks multiple times in the last two months and I’ve had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S

customer_reviews.title: Really good lock...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these locks... It is very easy to change to combo to what ever combo you want...
customer_reviews.author: David Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: The second lock is defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought the yellow set of 2. The first one was easy to set. It comes with instructions on how to do exactly so. The second one however will not push down at “0000” so that I can set my own code. Seems like the code is wrong or the item is defective. Overall if I didn’t have this problem I’d say these are some great locks.
customer_reviews.author: V A

customer_reviews.title: As described, they work well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my last business trip after my husband demonstrated it was possible to figure out and open my old 3-digit locks in 10 minutes! I love the bright colors, they make it easy to identify my bag on the carrousel. They are easy to set and reset. They feel sturdy, and I am hoping they will last.
customer_reviews.author: capricious

customer_reviews.title: Solid locks, good colors, Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I have used all four locks and ordered set of four extra. Very happy with locks. 1) Easy to configure and operate. 2) Good colors. 3) Good construction. 4) Numbers are visible clearly. What else you can ask for ??
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Luggage lock works well and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The white numerals on black are much easier to read than other locks. Setting my combination was simple, with clear directions given on the insert in the package. This lock has four numbers which makes it more secure when traveling than other locks which have only three numbers. The lock is very sturdy and a bit heavier than similar locks. I have used it on three trips and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found these. They are sturdy and easy to use. Really like the extra security of four digits. Having the digits in a designated window makes it real easy to enter the correct combination
customer_reviews.author: STEVE M.

customer_reviews.title: As listed
customer_reviews.text: String steel body and easy to read number that hide that offers protection as they are recessed and can be spun faster then traditional locks that use your finger digit by digit, these can spin faster between your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very nice locks
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through dozens of locks over the past few years and gave these a try. The bright colors are good to ID your luggage. Additionally the 4 digit code is located in the side of the lock and is easy to see. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Triplett

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENT
customer_reviews.text: I bought these TSA locks for my older suitcases since I am tired of TSA employees breaking my locks to open and check my suitcases. This way I won't have to lose anymore locks since they have the master key to these TSA locks.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Good but TSA bait for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is good and easy to use. However I believe it is TSA bait. Both my flights my luggage was went through and my sister who used the same lock same thing happened to hers both times. My uncle and aunt used other ways to lock their suitcase and had 0 issues. So just a heads up if you use these locks
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rosario

customer_reviews.title: International flight - couldn't open lock so they ripped off zipper
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why but TSA in China ripped this off and in turn broke off the zipper of my brand new $100 luggage bag. I don't know why they couldn't open it? so I guess it worked... maybe too well?
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This lock works as described and is very sturdy. It is nice to have the extra security of a four digit combination. Having optional colors other than your basic black is also nice too. All-around a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyjn13

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to figure out how to set my own combination I had to find a video to explain it but once I saw it I got it! Going to use on my suitcases for my up coming trip but I’m hoping they work like a charm I love that they are TSA approved and don’t have to break my locks!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Dolbow

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I almost gave this product a "4" because the instructions to enter the code were really confusing. Once I figured out one the others were easy but the number of degrees to turn in each direction - ugh. I stuck with the the "5" rating, though, because the locks are great - and I'm not the brightest following instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Travel Combination Locks
customer_reviews.text: Overall good, but one lock after setting lock code and using lock got stuck and even using reset instructions the lock would not reset. Lock remained jammed locked in open position and failed to unlock which rendered lock unuseful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It took me half an hour to figure out how to use it, had to do it a couple of times, couldn’t get the 4th one to work, so only 3 of them were working for me. Other than that had no problems with my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Change Combination and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've traveled twice now with these lock and checked my bags. I had no issues with the TSA not replacing them and they held up beautifully. The combination is easy to change, you can easily see the numbers and they are very sturdy. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TLWalls

customer_reviews.title: Short Shackle Lenght
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a gun case, but the shackle length was so short, wouldn't clasp over the locking point. Pretty cheap lock overall, so I just tossed them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking locks just don’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that there four wheels. I felt that this feature made them more secure! However, I was not able to customize the combination even though I tried for more than a half an hour! Therefore I will be returning the locks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great little locks
customer_reviews.text: These are not cable locks so they fit close to the zippers reducing catching on anything in transit. These have a 4-digit rather than a 3-digit system so they are more secure. Love the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Foresman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up with a personal code. Good, sturdy construction, should last a long time ( at least until TSA loses them). Bright color, with good paint, helps to spot my black luggage. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These locks are sturdy! Bought these to replace locks that had been damaged en route on my last trip. When they came in the mail, I was so pleased about how heavy-duty they are. Setting the combination was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: JFsB

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works well!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and do not slip, meaning it maintains your personalized combination accurately... a problem I have encountered eith a different travel lock manufacturer. Great price and value as well. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: AlphaMagna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to read combination
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for locking my suitcase when travelling locally or to Europe by plane. It's very durable and placement of combination on side of lock doesn't make you guess what side to set four digit numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and very heavy. I wish the hasp was as heavy duty as the lock itself. But I guess realistically the lock at this time is to keep honest people honest, not intended to keep a thief from opening your suitcase. I do recommend these locks.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Set the Combination
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who is a very handy guy, and I could never get this to work. I've used this type of lock from other manufacturers with no problem whatsoever. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kdwisni

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of Anvil luggage locks that I have purchased. They are rugged and resist mishandling by the airlines. They are the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Tough Lock For Its Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough luggage lock, easy to set up, attach and operate. Is durable and can take a beating. This is a nice lock for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. B. Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set your combination
customer_reviews.text: Liked that I could pick the color to quickly identify luggage at the airport. These are minimal security locks but useful to stop a quick theft from your luggage by baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen County Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly durable
customer_reviews.text: A surprisingly durable lock. I actually use these on the small locks on my camper. Did not expect them to be in such good shape after almost two years of exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The code can be set if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I like a combination padlock with 4 digits instead of 3 as this is more secure. If you follow the instructions slowly it is not difficult to set. I have in the past had problems setting some of these locks, but have returned the lock and got a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Pompom

customer_reviews.title: You really can't set the combination. RUN AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Like all the other reviews...I couldn't set the combination. I followed the directions but no go.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: Love the purple color - easy to see that your luggage is locked. Combination takes a few practices to use, but after that it is so easy. Can change combination easily if needed. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock works great, just need little practice to learn how to work with it. But i was able to use it while traveling and i did not lock myself out of my luggage 🙂
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: If you want orange (which I did) look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Ordered orange locks to differentiate my luggage from every other black suitcase. Got red. Not happy. It seems like a trivial thing, but not when 200 black bags are circling on a conveyor belt.
customer_reviews.author: CT Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to set. Couldn’t get it to work and the packaging is ruined trying to get it out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my luggage. Nothing else to say but that it works well. It does take a bit of time to understand how to change the combinations though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price and prefer these vs the suitcases with locks already installed. Can easily switch from one suitcase to another. Sturdy and great price
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Approved by tsa
customer_reviews.text: These locks are a plus with tsa; tsa has a special tool to open should they have to; I also sent a couple to others and they are appreciative that it is not a lock and key used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Both locks were bent up and failed on the first time used to secure my gun case on the plane ride to Canada. While easy to set up with a custom combination, they were to flimsy to hold up to the rigors of baggage handling. Arrived in Whitehorse bent, open, and unusable for the trip home. Pick something else!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D Moon

customer_reviews.title: One lock malfunctioned. All others work well.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, except that one lock would not release after attaching to luggage and had to be cut off. The others are working perfectly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Way, way, way too heavy.  Will break the zipper tabs.
customer_reviews.text: These are much too heavy and will ruin your suitcase pull tabs. Very disappointed. Nothing needs to be this heavy. A disaster in the making.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: How to reset these locks for personal use ~ when customer...
customer_reviews.text: I like the locks but was unable to unlock them to put my own code -- it came with the zero combo, but unable to reset -- so I need your advice ~ how to unlock them ~ A response would be appropriate .. Sincerely Henry.
customer_reviews.author: Ainokea

customer_reviews.title: Not really
customer_reviews.text: not very strong locks! on the first flight, one of the two broke down, and according to statistics, it turns out that it is 50/50. Not really
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav N.

customer_reviews.title: These locks attract TSA like a moth to a flame.
customer_reviews.text: Use was to keep handlers out... but after about 30 flights I put one on and TSA rummaged through my bag. Hoping they enjoyed my dirty underwear. I was left a card telling me they were there. I had nothing any different in the luggage than ever packed. My phone call to them probably just ended any Pre-Check in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Vietvet.   good game to pass the time. It was a free app so I can't complain..

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: The custom combination was easy to set and came with easy to understand instructions. I also liked that this lock was available in many different colors other than just black or silver. I chose purple and it really helped me to easily distinguish my luggage from others.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Apuya

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item
customer_reviews.text: I decided to return these TSA Approved locks after seeing how small they were and how easy they may be manipulated to open. The bright yellow concerned me that it might draw unwanted attention to my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Works well, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Basic combo lock performed well. TSA accessed my bag and locked it up again.
customer_reviews.author: tchcdon

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: These locks are the best from what my granddaughter says. As yet, I have not used them due to the virus, hopefully in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E. Behringer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and security
customer_reviews.text: We will be traveling internationally next month and we’ll have 6 bags to check-in. These look sturdy enough and 4-digit combinations will be more difficult to guess.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I did have problem with one of the 2-pack I bought, but they replaced it immediately. They are sturdy and work very well. And I like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and set up and it’s very sturdy. It’s little heavy but that doesn’t take away from the product. READ THE DIRECTIONS ONLINE you won’t be able to change the code once you enter it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: They worked well. TSA able to get in because they left a note.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: SECURE AND BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and well made. East to use and the bright yellow color makes spotting my luggage on the first go round a pleasure. Easy to set your own combination. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ELTRAIN

customer_reviews.title: The lock is easy to use and easy to see on the suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: I had no negative opinions on this lock. It was very easy to use and with the way the suitcase was thrown around on our trip to Alaska, it stood up to the abuse. Once on the luggage ramp, it was easy to spot as ours.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M Dever

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy locks
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy locks - easy instructions for setting the combination. These worked well for our trip, and the bright color helped us identify out bags more easily at baggage claim!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Locks. Wish I still had them?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy and super dependable locks. They are so good I have had both of them stolen by TSA agents at the airports.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly connecting two luggage zippers together
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality with very easy to read the dials. I am using them to secure a bag with zippers made to interconnect and place a travel lock through. They work flawlessly for the intended purpose and will keep the normal riffraff out. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: RcBob

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for large luggage
customer_reviews.text: It is little large lock, it looks awkward in my cabin luggage / small suitcase. It is suitable for large check in luggages. Good and quality product though...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my trip over seas to England. No issues through the airports. Easy to use. Easy to read instructions. No issue.
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy luggage locks, great value!  Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy luggage locks. TSA approved! Worked very well! Never got stuck or had any problems. Have used many times when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peraza

product_meta.title: TSA Approved Luggage Lock - 4 Digit Combination padlocks with a Hardened Steel Shackle - Travel Locks for Suitcases & Baggage
product_meta.description:
◆The most durable locks on the market.Our luggage locks use a zinc alloy body to keep your luggage secure throughout the longest of trips. A special window design not only makes your combination easier to read but also protects the lock dials from damage.





◆The hardened steel shackle won’t warp and is highly resistant to cutting.All Anvil shackles are made from high carbon steel. This steel goes through a hardening and tempering process to greatly increase its durability. While other lock shackles may bend during airport handling, Anvil shackles will endure the worst punishment your travels can dish out.





◆Make sure your luggage isn’t left unlocked by the TSA.Our locks use a special design that requires baggage inspectors to relock them before removing their master key.





◆Last but not least,all our locks are backed up with a lifetime warranty which shows our confidence in the craftsmanship of our product.





How it works:





 1.  
 2.  
 3.  Set the lock’s combination to 0000. Pull up on the shackle.
 4.  
 5.  
 6.  Rotate the shackle 90 degrees counterclockwise.
 7.  
 8.  
 9.  Push the shackle down. You should feel the shackle slide down and hit a spring.
 10. 
 11. 
 12. While pressing down, rotate the shackle another 90 degrees counterclockwise.
 13. 
 14. 
 15. Scroll the dial numbers to set your own combination.
 16. 
 17. 
 18. Rotate the shackle back in the reverse direction until the shackle pops up.
 19. 
 20. 
 21. Your combination has now been set.
 22. 
 23. 





 * 
 * 
 * For security reasons there is no reset code on our locks. Please be sure to memorize the combination, write it down or take a picture of it.
 * 
 *
feature_bullets: SET YOUR OWN COMINATION AND CHANGE IT ANYTIME. With a simple twist and push of the shackle, you can set your combination in less than twenty seconds. Not happy with the combination you set, you can change it as many times as you want.

THE SECURITY OF FOUR DIGITS. Our luggage locks use four digits to make it harder for thieves to crack your combination. Four digits can also be easier for you to remember as you can set the combination to your pin or the year you were born.

DESIGNED FOR SECURITY AND EASE OF USE. An ultra-durable zinc alloy body and hardened steel shackle ensures your luggage lock will make it through rough airport handling. High contrast white on black dial numerals and combination window make reading your combination easy.
EASE OF MIND WITH A LIFETIME WARRANTY. We have you covered with a comprehensive lifetime warranty which covers damage by the TSA and baggage handlers
100% TSA APPROVED. Travel worry free knowing that the TSA won't cut your locks when they inspect your luggage.
